elements.2211.03116_11573de01bf8a390bd42d1f7272bd: Computing systems form the backbone of many areas in our society, from manufacturing to traffic control, healthcare, and financial systems
elements.2211.03116_5666b6c97307e29a255ba13ea216b: When software plays a vital role in the design, construction, and operation, these systems are referred as software-intensive systems
elements.2211.03116_2a5783ed8b626f9c5975217ef9e22: Self-adaptation equips a software-intensive system with a feedback loop that either automates tasks that otherwise need to be performed by human operators or deals with uncertain conditions
elements.2211.03116_0e05648b732e3d9de7ce0025d8174: Such feedback loops have found their way to a variety of practical applications; typical examples are an elastic cloud to adapt computing resources and automated server management to respond quickly to business needs
elements.2211.03116_aef8f3eb23a6a2d759671e41bc9be: To gain insight into the motivations for applying self-adaptation in practice, the problems solved using self-adaptation and how these problems are solved, and the difficulties and risks that industry faces in adopting self-adaptation, we performed a large-scale survey
elements.2211.03116_68065f8e23b8f3a12f54b5e13d671: We received 184 valid responses from practitioners spread over 21 countries
elements.2211.03116_2d96ad7ef5061d568127deb4859a1: Based on the analysis of the survey data, we provide an empirically grounded overview of state-of-the-practice in the application of self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_86889e673250563237dee1ac46b3b: From that, we derive insights for researchers to check their current research with industrial needs, and for practitioners to compare their current practice in applying self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_db36d59dbd46c2226c47f5fb77326: These insights also provide opportunities for the application of self-adaptation in practice and pave the way for future industry-research collaborations.
elements.2211.03116_28e250eb2a9ad49e4e7167ca4f306: Computing systems form the backbone of our factories, traffic control systems, healthcare, telecommunication, financial systems, and so forth
elements.2211.03116_21d8b46fb7ff04835e7cc2ca9760f: When software plays a vital role in their design, construction, and operation, these systems are often referred to as software-intensive systems
elements.2211.03116_4fd7132dd0514558df522241de601: The trustworthiness and sustainability of these systems is vital for our society
elements.2211.03116_f8171d836feea72b00c5c7ecde0ea: Yet, building and maintaining trustworthy and sustainable systems is challenging due to complexity that arises from the growing demands on these systems, their continued integration, the uncertain operating conditions they face, the fast speed of technological progress, etc
elements.2211.03116_f1d2614e58e81deb3de1a11e364fb: These challenges have been a continuous driver for new and innovative approaches to design, develop, and operate software-intensive systems
elements.2211.03116_b8b600537497ed3e80e7bc5b95d11: One common approach today is so called DevOps in which development and operation are blended, allowing system components to be easily evolved and redeployed without impacting their operation
elements.2211.03116_72877664622c85eb299c8d24cdec4: A classic approach to address the increasing complexity of software-intensive systems is transferring control from humans
elements.2211.03116_e1531685b7a37f3308f7e48e7d19a: to software components by equipping systems with feedback loops that automate tasks that otherwise need to be performed by human operators.
elements.2211.03116_18e6c9850d6914d1a0df47d442844: These feedback loops monitor the system and its environment, reason about the system behaviour and its goals, and adapt the system to ensure its goals under changing conditions, or gracefully degrade if necessary
elements.2211.03116_f6b48884cbf8f9be895a669e1b6e1: Such goals can be very diverse, ranging from ensuring a required level of performance under uncertain workload conditions, dealing with errors caused by external services that are difficult to predict, or defending the system against malicious attacks and the problems they may cause
elements.2211.03116_42dfd22aefe92256b08339cb8cbf9: A typical example is a feedback loop deployed in a cloud environment that expands or decreases computing resources to meet changing demands while minimising the cost of operation
elements.2211.03116_ef61ab18ebab151da76de7043823b: Another example is a container framework that performs autoscaling in a microservice deployment
elements.2211.03116_477bf4be811458266f889a025f056: The principles of applying feedback control to software-intensive systems have been the subject of active study in academia
elements.2211.03116_05fced9b8bdcc83c050c3697cde23: presented a seminal paper at the International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE) where the authors introduced the notion of
elements.2211.03116_fe3b68a8a734767e3604bb0cc5542: that comprises two simultaneous processes: system adaptation that is concerned with detecting and handling changing circumstances, and system evolution that is concerned with the consistent application of change over time
elements.2211.03116_12f47da3866435076aecc74d2e3ab: A few years later, Garlan et. al.
elements.2211.03116_355188005c5a07c1dec9c0c40152e: stated the crucial role of architectural models as first-class citizens that enable a system to reason about system-wide change and adapt itself accordingly to achieve or maintain its goals
elements.2211.03116_95afa94f0e78edf2ab3c714ad33c3: consolidated and elaborated on these principles in what is now generally known as
elements.2211.03116_fc9b45668fb18b74071097c75ec4e: stated the crucial role of software architecture in the realisation of self-adaptive systems, distinguishing adaptation management from goal management
elements.2211.03116_28b25e712b0d04970a7374b5c3a21: Over the last decade, the research community has developed a vast body of knowledge and know-how on principles, see e.g.,
elements.2211.03116_f57487d255ce9c962884d394ae513: Researchers have documented a substantial number of literature reviews and surveys on various topics in self-adaptive systems, such as the benefits of self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_76d6936b1083270adf0ef120eb04c: , the use of formal methods in self-adaptive systems
elements.2211.03116_58d7302a895acb051900513e9dc4f: , and the use of machine learning in the realisation of self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_cd2ad40d908b084911e3fd85f5f2c: Basic research works in the field of self-adaptation are for example
elements.2211.03116_bb1cc79893aaa7491ae58d0fdcc8c: In parallel, the principles of feedback control have been studied and applied in industry
elements.2211.03116_580e7218980e56b549c39c9c383e3: For example, about two decades ago, IBM launched its legendary initiative on autonomic computing
elements.2211.03116_505df07444b8735d559542e07e896: Inspired by the autonomic nervous system of the human body, the central idea of autonomic computing was to enable computing systems to manage themselves based on high-level goals
elements.2211.03116_0bbb041e33d3a0be6024e44255172: Four classic goals are self-optimisation, self-healing, self-protection, and self-configuration
elements.2211.03116_a2c50777385b5ae14dcbe16e10b14: Autonomic computing delegates the complexity of system operation to the machine aiming to reduce the time required by operators to resolve system difficulties and other maintenance tasks such as software updates
elements.2211.03116_ee818997d4cc384c2b0b7b725f5d9: Over the years, industrial solutions based on feedback loops have found their way to practical applications, for instance in the domain of elastic cloud to adapt computing resources and automated management of server parks to deal with changing business needs, e.g.,
elements.2211.03116_2965ffbeab0411bf985f6fdc21661: While the output of academic research is documented in research articles, journal volumes, and books, the current practice of self-adaptation in industry has never been systematically described.
elements.2211.03116_ceac9b3a7921930a2939e55c96903: Our general objective is to better understand the state of practice of self-adaptation in industry
elements.2211.03116_95a410a0b3984cf11c9cb914ffc5b: To that end, we perform a large-scale survey with active practitioners
elements.2211.03116_27072f628c2e6b88edde78f30208f: Concretely, this survey aims at shining a light on what motivates practitioners to apply self-adaptation, what kind of problems they solve using self-adaptation, how practitioners design and develop self-adaptive systems, whether they follow any established practices, what difficulties and risks they face in adopting self-adaptation, and what future opportunities industry sees for the application of self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_a6af288971ddc7588e0c17f4708a4: To the best of our knowledge, no systematic study has been done that investigates and these issues
elements.2211.03116_52e2190d090946294a5bfd572754c: Hence, there is no clear and documented view of why and how the principles of self-adaptation are applied in practice, and what challenges practitioners face when realising self-adaptation.
elements.2211.03116_25ab6cb495305f02e2871ed70242e: Investigating industrial practice on self-adaptation and answering the questions targeted by this study will help narrow the gap between industry and academia
elements.2211.03116_f8186a31710c0c08876ebf41cc9f5: It aims at helping researchers in academia to get a better picture of how self-adaptation is applied in practice, the industrial needs in realising self-adaptation, and what problems practitioners face
elements.2211.03116_d41e074bae3fb94081d7340222b9d: We conjecture that having a better picture about industry practice will help the research community to position their efforts with respect to industrial needs and make well-informed decisions to set future research objectives, both fundamental and applied
elements.2211.03116_8d189b794496e11e6e6fb1db39131: On the other hand, drawing a picture of the state-of-the-practice can also benefit industry by sharing the motivations and potential benefits of self-adaptation, directing them towards relevant sources of information such as best practices, and identifying opportunities for collaboration with researchers to address the problems they face
elements.2211.03116_1df40fbff642f66e6b9fdf331d0af: We aim to answer the following concrete research questions:
elements.2211.03116_bf5ffb5cdfec8a6b39ca603ae8029: What drives practitioners to apply self-adaptation in software-intensive systems?
elements.2211.03116_dffc03bd6f84cbc8daec89c1b66ba: How do practitioners apply self-adaptation in industrial software-intensive systems?
elements.2211.03116_7a11db51f65ba5257d418bde52943: What are the experiences of practitioners with applying self-adaptation and do they see opportunities for how and where to apply self-adaptation?
elements.2211.03116_2722d70cc981ad2caec468e3569ef: With RQ1, we want to investigate the motivations of practitioners for applying self-adaptation, the kinds of industrial systems for which self-adaptation is applied, and the types of problems they solve using self-adaptation.
elements.2211.03116_a3adaf1bf271be70bc2ccaff9cb1c: In academic research, self-adaptation has been proposed for two main complementary problems
elements.2211.03116_fc87b0258e6a407b5221c748f9541: : 1) to automate the management of complex software-intensive systems based on high-level goals provided by operators, and 2) to deal with operating conditions that are hard to predict before deployment and need to be resolved during operation (i.e., mitigating uncertainties)
elements.2211.03116_35621a89add8eab865a3ce783ed5d: Key management tasks for self-adaptation are self-healing, self-optimisation, self-protection, and self-configuration
elements.2211.03116_1ff6b16abf004bd227d495385d2d2: We want to understand whether industry uses the principles of self-adaptation to deal with the same or different problems, and whether and how they relate to the classic system and software management tasks
elements.2211.03116_bf698e084de95a6973a9d865cf8aa: Answering RQ1 will shine a light on application areas, motivations, and concrete problems for which self-adaptation is applied by practitioners or could be applied by practitioners who currently do not use self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_3d17ef3af19fd2d3b31b468cc8a3b: This may provide academics with insights in relevant areas to drive and validate research results on self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_46532266eb6bd754fef6856a2c79f: The results may also indicate applications and problems that are not yet explored in industry and may benefit both academia and industry
elements.2211.03116_433d67d83998d1a94ddd92e6bc6c7: With RQ2, we aim to investigate the perception of practitioners on the concept of
elements.2211.03116_4b30fa94e9adc20d8f54c10be5cbf: We are particularly interested in how practitioners characterise self-adaptation as a property that enables a system to adapt itself at runtime.
elements.2211.03116_f22486234080234d0b9cbb9fb0476: To that end, we will elicit concrete examples of what they understand by self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_5a2524aaba8fd7f2cd29019cfd637: This will give us better understanding of whether and how practitioners understand the concept of self-adaptation, what terminology they use, whether there are any differences in the viewpoints on what constitutes self-adaptation, and whether they consider self-adaptation altogether useful
elements.2211.03116_04dadb45baa9c2f3b77843f0a3f58: This may also shine a light on whether there are any (emerging) industrial standard practices, e.g., a
elements.2211.03116_1641549f67cf47554a2fa77b6e683: Answering RQ2 will help researchers to get a better picture of how practitioners understand the concept of self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_42f0e35141dc1ffd3ede92fe93694: On the other hand, the insights may reveal potential opportunities for practitioners to benefit from expertise of other practitioners as well as knowledge developed by researchers
elements.2211.03116_25b2287b04e57f100739429f6b045: With RQ3, we aim at examining how self-adaptation has been realised and used in industry
elements.2211.03116_acced341a0d141789a522783fa98a: We are particularly interested in mechanisms, tools, benchmarks, and processes employed in the industry to engineer self-adaptive solutions.
elements.2211.03116_905c9fadd3c3ba3f2c0190eb4ead6: We will pay attention to the degree of automation and the role of humans in runtime adaptation as this is commonly considered important for trust in software-intensive systems, see e.g.,
elements.2211.03116_11b68aa7470bd84b12d6607fddc26: Furthermore, we are interested in comparing industrial practices with solutions developed by academics, such as modelling techniques, frameworks, and verification techniques
elements.2211.03116_0c60d5b32faece0e90bf26304561d: We also want to understand how practitioners obtain trust in the self-adaptive solutions they employ
elements.2211.03116_5c90701afecf89fff4544e9da0b1c: Answering RQ3 will provide insights into best practices on how practitioners realise self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_37eb025c522b75f6e3cf624e01684: It will highlight the criteria that practitioners use to apply and realise self-adaptation solutions and may shine a light on to what extent solutions from the research community have been adopted in industry
elements.2211.03116_61c25c2bfdc6a3b0713bc51b9da57: These insights will open opportunities for both academia and industry to steer future research and improve practical applications
elements.2211.03116_01d42f48d9d85437d93f8923605c6: Finally, with RQ4, we want to understand the difficulties and risks, if any, that practitioners experience in the design, implementation, and other engineering activities of self-adaptive systems
elements.2211.03116_29baf0a0adf1402130b27bf49114a: We also will probe whether practitioners face problems for which they would appreciate support from researchers
elements.2211.03116_40b810108bfdb244969987c47db46: Finally, we elicit opportunities that practitioners see for applying self-adaptation that are not exploited yet
elements.2211.03116_2c5d46c8647bb2bc67e5fe5630da7: Answering RQ4 may help to fill the gap between academia and industry
elements.2211.03116_4486c4a6e5f8fcbb80f2e8dbd7ec5: Furthermore, identifying problems and risks may trigger new collaborative studies to investigate and address these challenges
elements.2211.03116_aff0989ecdfce972aebd368b4bdd8: Such studies are likely to bridge the gap and result in more targeted research and improved industrial applications of self-adaptive systems.
elements.2211.03116_e527bdacb0db0edd81d6dc284f57d: By drawing a landscape of the use of self-adaptation in industry, the survey results benefit both researchers and practitioners
elements.2211.03116_d9be6ca3f0073ea2f268716ba4342: Concretely, the contributions of this study are:
elements.2211.03116_4a122607680e96bd07f5cbb7c1982: An empirically grounded overview of state-of-the-practice in the application of self-adaptation;
elements.2211.03116_cda4b08bfc0204dbf03b85ca3ddb5: Insights for researchers to assess their current research in relation to industrial needs;
elements.2211.03116_0105cea4c18c08997332ca3dd0bdb: Insights for practitioners to assess the level of their current practice in applying self-adaptation;
elements.2211.03116_a522cdf748464f32040796b81d29f: Additional prospects for applying self-adaptation in practice and opportunities for industry-research collaborations.

elements.2211.03116_1bd78ccb3159e353366e2824f0ef4: we present the study design with the survey questions and analysis methods used
elements.2211.03116_faf9531f93ded226d30210c7b09dd: presents the results for each research question and provides key insights for each research question
elements.2211.03116_c762eaecf975d0e42c7629a87d1d1: , we derive insights from the study results for researchers and practitioners

elements.2211.03116_128a8b41e6be654e78c96e41de1e9: In this study we use a survey as research method
elements.2211.03116_ea548b51ac4531246be85d6160657: Subsequently, we discuss the population and sample, the questionnaire, and the data analysis methods we used.
elements.2211.03116_84522cc681651c06e56eff9bb97ea: Our target population are practitioners that are actively involved in the engineering of industrial software-intensive systems in any domain
elements.2211.03116_df77e31905c23d844a9356d1692b2: This includes architects, designers, developers, testers, maintainers, operators, and other people who have technical expertise and are actively involved in the development and maintenance of these software systems
elements.2211.03116_4f532f11da55b276d224e05de4039: Concretely, we contacted 355 practitioners from a wide variety of companies
elements.2211.03116_03684e31fb5b27415ef50dbde9615: via the networks of the researchers involved in this study (i.e., the authors of this paper) to complete the survey
elements.2211.03116_d50162a9db0930e95b07c9df68167: We used two criteria to invite people: (1) participants should be active in different domains that are representative of software-intensive systems, and (2) participants have the required expertise to answer the questions
elements.2211.03116_b6d7cf9269a8a15dc209a9aef36d8: The invited practitioners were spread over in total 21 countries.
elements.2211.03116_640d5a80ad2250b7fa171f0bf8f59: The invitations were sent by personalised emails in different batches during the period from November 30, 2020 until July 31, 2022
elements.2211.03116_9324857e7793a3016d3b4095a5145: We sent reminders according to a predefined
elements.2211.03116_935039bd55926e6ea89800fce25dd: The survey used a questionnaire to collect data based on a set of predefined questions
elements.2211.03116_fae9e564278ed1f6d14862813c9ca: Because practitioners are not necessarily familiar with the term self-adaptation, the survey started with a gentle introduction of the core idea of what constitutes a self-adaptive system using basic terminology commonly used in industry, and illustrated this with a few characteristic examples to make it concrete
elements.2211.03116_4bca476802b0b7632f03c76733332: We used both closed and open questions
elements.2211.03116_257a54fe95896716b20e7078a629e: Closed questions have a predefined set of answers, such as yes/no, or multiple choice
elements.2211.03116_fa3e0ffd446dd220b5bee3fe329c8: We also allowed participants to add extra options for answering several closed questions using a text field
elements.2211.03116_729a5f764731d37ad571e1c9ffa3a: Open questions provide a space that participants can use to provide an answer
elements.2211.03116_aeb9dc4eec8736d48764010a13dc9: While closed questions allow acquiring a clear view on a particular topic using basic statistics, open questions allow acquiring in-depth insights using qualitative analysis
elements.2211.03116_694f254b730d46291694c6bc878b5: We provide a replication package with all study materials, including the study protocol, the questionnaire, the raw data, and the analysis results.
elements.2211.03116_7f11be890de36955b36bf4e01d656: For this study we used a self-administered anonymous online questionnaire (Survey
elements.2211.03116_cda6fb9c44d4f4c749a283ce1e389: Report hosted by Linnaeus University, Sweden).
elements.2211.03116_67a42c76da6fa3c913c06100f08af: The main motivation to use an online questionnaire is to involve a large set of participants with relatively low cost (both time-wise and financially).
elements.2211.03116_f97fef819f89632f048844ae13b10: We created an initial list of survey questions that were directly derived from the research questions of this study
elements.2211.03116_3f8cc8b95df0ce577ac0acf86fe81: The initial list of questions was composed by two members of the research team and then crosschecked by the other team members
elements.2211.03116_5f1e4b440d128b7da0696bbb39fe4: We validated the questionnaire in a pilot with eight randomly-selected participants from the target population
elements.2211.03116_338f5c0d496c355891e0ac1aff720: For this pilot, we added additional meta-questions to the questionnaire about clarity of terminology and questions, relevance of the questions, scope of the questions, and the time required to complete the survey
elements.2211.03116_39e663d84ec7021201ecef2cea132: For both clarity of terminology and clarity of the questions we obtained an average score of 4.38 on a scale from 1 (Not clear at all) to 5 (Very clear)
elements.2211.03116_d8c70bbf6e0bb81eaef3b3b10aaef: None of the participants indicated that questions should be removed or modified
elements.2211.03116_4541d43a0df4cb20517f9f85788bd: Six participants indicated that no important aspects were missing
elements.2211.03116_91791d9acfab3396bb8d5d9d9336a: One participant hinted that we may also probe whether the use of self-adaptation requires a specialised team in the company or alternatively infrastructure to share knowledge
elements.2211.03116_3f7f0233f909727ea8252fb24df58: Another participant suggested adding a question about scalability of solutions for self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_a7a327cd75f17a8d95df867f16c60: One participant stated that the example system we used to introduce self-adaptation may create some bias, and further that answers to questions may differ depending on roles on the engineering teams
elements.2211.03116_c0a55d14230ab1c4c233cabfebcef: The average reported time to complete the survey was 24 minutes
elements.2211.03116_22497900298374b5b5244be6f93d2: Based on the feedback, we adjusted the introductory part of the questionnaire
elements.2211.03116_2943a325e91636494b06402c79bfc: We did not revise the questions as they were perceived as clear and well scoped
elements.2211.03116_3fbc47062d4ba1be3eaf64fb67602: The finalised questionnaire was then distributed to the participants as explained above

elements.2211.03116_01fc9f1a1b8d9a7f6c91e8a354788: To analyse closed questions, we used descriptive statistics and quantitative data analysis
elements.2211.03116_a3f29047d706567e5bf07cf266133: Therefore, we mostly report frequencies of answers, percentages relative to the respective number of responses, and relationships between answers to questions based on contingency matrices (based on the categorisation of answers)
elements.2211.03116_9db05e1117cd9433875dd3f00bddb: We only report relationships that led to relevant insights
elements.2211.03116_1c89f7e50493ef113b93d7d5da9e7: To analyse comments to open questions, we used qualitative data analysis
elements.2211.03116_e01b34f47ddb3728a9fc2d9b43677: In particular, we used inductive reasoning to construct codes and infer categories from the data by labelling occurrences of codes and grouping them into categories
elements.2211.03116_d26f48ae9c1f9ff56c48ad8e531ed: Similar to others (e.g., Prechelt et al.
elements.2211.03116_89742f76fd2c3912da9d9477f4e76: ), we tried to keep coding simple
elements.2211.03116_94d7abc706b81a3667ad01556ada9: We did not have a pre-defined coding schema or a pre-defined granularity or semantic style for the codes
elements.2211.03116_4cf89614f028fdf3990df4b2931e9: However, we interpreted comments in the context of the question for which they were given
elements.2211.03116_d12c58dd87a860f22345ad4918d26: We used a simple version of open coding
elements.2211.03116_a758dbb271975f94b66819f6f4cfe: Similar to Mendez Fernandez et al.
elements.2211.03116_41687a7c038e7f54ac1444a974512: , we used open coding to add codes to small coherent fragments of the comments
elements.2211.03116_18d8fcf0319201b17aa1d243c67aa: We then categorised the developed concepts in a hierarchy of categories as an abstraction of the codes
elements.2211.03116_ad3391d79c54c380b45ed8d5e0586: We coded in sub-teams of two or three coders in total 886 comments of 12 open questions
elements.2211.03116_334252ac8dcedffe068be50c0f777: Coding was first done individually and then consolidated in the sub-team
elements.2211.03116_d2826781a7d5735555b215a7606a6: Two other researchers crosschecked the consolidated coding
elements.2211.03116_179d7d0d29bf685e0f18065db9840: Where necessary, the coding was adjusted in consensus between the sub-team and the researchers
elements.2211.03116_fcf2822d81515b5905e57a18535a8: We excluded some comments from coding, e.g., if they did not provide any additional insights or if they were too generic, e.g., a participant answering
elements.2211.03116_2df999f7cc4d968af5004e2b37965: to a closed question and stating
elements.2211.03116_26ff6184d5d08477035fb47f696f7: Also, we did not map the answers to a closed question to comments for that question
elements.2211.03116_88ddaa915b856a911097e513e7485: For example, a participant may have answered that they never reused solutions for self-adaptation, but in their comments indicated reasons that they
elements.2211.03116_7a32333ff8605ec668a651d845ab1: do so (i.e., one comment may cover several concepts, which may not necessarily match the answer to the closed question)
elements.2211.03116_0f841f01f3645307bdb24fde42b3e: When reporting example quotes from comments in Section
elements.2211.03116_72a0be2806a30f53d9c0cbfba6b76: , we use verbatim excerpts, including spelling and punctuation errors.
elements.2211.03116_aa6bac568639f744386a483dbbbb0: In total, 184 participants completed the survey from 355 invitations, i.e., a response rate of 51.8
elements.2211.03116_7418974a3abb3c41c5d001c9cdc04: Based on the answers to the first question (Q0.1), we split the answers of the other questions of the demographics in two groups: those provided by all participants and those provided by participants that worked with concrete self-adaptive systems.
elements.2211.03116_eaf1dd8dfa3390252f1ca28662995: Of the 184 participants that provided valid data, 100 (54.4
elements.2211.03116_3e31324191c91f35ae1b52dba9c21: ) expressed to have worked with concrete self-adaptive systems.
elements.2211.03116_e29d65b9fed4dc4be622bbc6b6a8f: ) provided a valid description of the kind of systems they build
elements.2211.03116_255bff050fe5417305d97c6baa3d4: Based on the analysis of the data we could classify the answers along two axes: the
elements.2211.03116_77a3c1689d60a7a7bb7cf5dff2ef5: of software systems built by the organisations, and the

elements.2211.03116_9ac41c2ce8f4dec7a0b4ba39eb6df: Note that the data used to answer RQ1 comes from the 100 participants that have experience with concrete self-adaptive systems (i.e., the participants that answered
elements.2211.03116_eeaca4748931d1c3e74d99f11658b: For which problems do you apply self-adaptation? (Q1.1)
elements.2211.03116_e214c30db99d8beabf87e41e8394a: On average, the participants applied self-adaptation for 3.6 types of problems from the predefined list (with seven options)
elements.2211.03116_b9c5b1bca54291976fdcc01ffad13: The results show that practitioners apply self-adaptation to deal with a variety of problems
elements.2211.03116_53d39e4af17ea5ff04e4cc7092b70: Optimising performance and automating tasks are the main problems addressed by self-adaptation in industry
elements.2211.03116_3a0988950c8314b9b9d4b7306bf93: On the other hand, dealing with changes in business goals is less frequently solved using self-adaptation. `Others' include for example support for testing and evolution.
elements.2211.03116_3b3559efb171b34fe55b2b87275d8: What are the main business motivations to apply self-adaptation? (Q1.2)
elements.2211.03116_a6391668bcf329da880f7ebe78035: On average, the participants provided 2.1 business motivations to apply self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_48023f3641d97ea4c2afc78f51a8d: Improving user satisfaction, reducing costs, and mitigating risks are the most selected motivations for using self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_c3ffcb1f61a116064dd14d28ca093: Opening up new application opportunities was selected by a lower number of 21 participants
elements.2211.03116_46e3673effebc8d529a8639161110: Examples of `Others' are improving utility and managing complexity.
elements.2211.03116_73dddbf2a3f91103007671565ef89: What could be benefits of applying self-adaptation? (Q1.3)
elements.2211.03116_4b9997ad9e8f7b5c0b00a2d4eeeef: provided meaningful descriptions of benefits of self-adaptation, an average of 1.8 benefits per participant.
elements.2211.03116_0958cf795a5dd4ab8f9f7f169d0ce: We summarise the findings in Table
elements.2211.03116_45e73637a82d4ab4512583570d41f: For each category (bold font) and code, we include how often it appeared and we provide a few example quotes.
elements.2211.03116_3532f05abac8314260eb10b58a3a6: The dominating benefits of applying self-adaptation are
elements.2211.03116_947d296aacc1e228c9b1ac6f79b84: in costs and resources (38 participants), and
elements.2211.03116_60a9fd2182284da45537e5539022d: Self-adaptation is widely applied in industry across a wide variety of domains.
elements.2211.03116_a9f02dfa5971cea6b6ce3a4cdc86f: Practitioners primarily apply self-adaptation to optimise performance, automate tasks, and deal with changes in the deployment environment.
elements.2211.03116_bf5b841b7415d86eee2fbde3e64d1: The dominating business motives to apply self-adaptation in industry are primarily improving user satisfaction and reducing costs, and secondarily mitigating risks.
elements.2211.03116_48c96b8d6ad45d3b0a2793ba3e67a: The main benefits of applying self-adaptation are improved utility (in robustness and performance), savings (costs and resources), improved human interaction (user experience and engineers support), and handling dynamics (in the context and system load).
elements.2211.03116_41f9ad5af9823e71410328c358602: Explain a concrete self-adaptive system you worked with (Q2.1)

elements.2211.03116_791a765b62174313dc841e01e04a0: With this cross analyses we aim to gain further insights into three topics of interest: benefits of applying self-adaptation in practice, difficulties and risks with engineering self-adaptation in practice, and research support to address problems in practice.

elements.2211.03116_40eccbaa96e55592dc2666288f0cd: Yet, one particular difference is the lack of emphasis of practitioners on the use of self-adaptation to mitigate uncertainties, which has been a key focus in research
elements.2211.03116_96a8068815b02bc6ca8f4b6d4fde9: A possible explanation is that practitioners avoid the term uncertainty that may be perceived as
elements.2211.03116_c241c2369b007d66e6a4ee7b3f35b: Instead, they refer to uncertainty indirectly by using a different vocabulary, such as
elements.2211.03116_f9f808ce3749093a071160dd8dd81: available metrics are not always fully transparent.
elements.2211.03116_b12f0c8fff68a14eec66e370ce1f2: While practitioners apply self-adaptation to deal with a variety of problems, changes in business goals are less frequently solved by using self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_5763d2e8cce2d691be35aed647fe8: One possible explanation may be that business goals are usually about higher-level requirements, while the focus of self-adaptation is often targeting
elements.2211.03116_fed42728cf85a27260412d0aeda51: In addition, there is also the challenge of the mapping between business goal and technical/system metrics, which touches the line or work on dynamic software product lines
elements.2211.03116_cad640a07b3953bb0aefa6d2073ea: Yet, another explanation may be that self-adaptation has not yet been fully utilised in industry to deal with bigger system changes
elements.2211.03116_779c268361b252e625dc12c2896cf: We hypothesise that the latter is the case, but further study is needed to obtain deeper insight
elements.2211.03116_9df4e63d2413b92fa2fe71ae8ca96: The four classic management tasks of self-adaptation studied by researchers (self-healing, self-optimising, self-protecting, and self-configuring) are also relevant to practitioners
elements.2211.03116_ace4f1d7a83a7ab9a05fe20a5d82e: Yet, differently from academics, practitioners also emphasise the importance of improving user satisfaction, reducing costs, and mitigating risks
elements.2211.03116_eb2ef3d87f55696411af681b16d3d: Practitioners make extensive use of tools and infrastructures to realise the different functions of self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_967f37a5c2ac5883c9f509b7862c7: This points to the need for more emphasis on tools and supporting infrastructure in research
elements.2211.03116_bcbd2f1eb39f2dd608500e2849b3f: Related to that is the need for reusing solutions, for instance in the form of references architectures and patterns
elements.2211.03116_894b82310824c5f9cc533c4a31bf6: While some research efforts have been taken in these directions, these issues deserve more attention
elements.2211.03116_b9e1857c77c8f0787987adc8684a7: An interesting step in this direction is the development of industry relevant artifacts as outlined in
elements.2211.03116_b75f17dc9f647874f1e82d83594b2: Self-adaption in software-intensive systems is often not completely automated
elements.2211.03116_637d327dd9ab25e98fc3aa4c29715: Humans remain involved in adaptation, either to provide parts of functions or just to supervise the system
elements.2211.03116_88a00d554c069b27d0cc88dded193: On the one hand, for some companies this is the first step towards further automation; on the other hand, practitioners often express the need for involving humans to ensure trust by overseeing the system and take action when something unexpected happens
elements.2211.03116_d0f410f52483c19d58a9c5783b16d: As such, we expect the role of humans in self-adaptation to remain important also for future industry relevant research in self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_2c8694708e994f0a5232ecc4e01c1: It is remarkable that more than 50
elements.2211.03116_03f1bcbc5d3e7175b7faf9fac404c: of the participants report that they face at least sometimes risks with applying self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_4199c95a81d55d2a9d8be2a0ad488: At the same time, about half of the practitioners express that they would appreciate support from researchers to deal with the problems they face
elements.2211.03116_d1cba5824d29539fe625d2d4263a6: This suggests that the engineering of efficient and trustworthy self-adaptive systems is a challenge in practice and that practitioners believe that support from research could benefit them to deal with these challenges
elements.2211.03116_11717f610839567caa4ef6221ee22: This opens opportunities for joint efforts between industry and academics.

elements.2211.03116_e70bc8af966f370b6989824abe373: The main artifact of reuse is system module.

elements.2211.03116_f970f415d5baef07348a38bb8727a: When comparing large companies (>100) and small/medium companies (<100) (Q0.3), we observe no major difference in the reported frequency of encountered risks (Q4.3-4.4)

elements.2211.03116_26c819e86d33ff755e1f9e71d47a8: Zooming into the data of mechanisms for the different stages of self-adaptation shows that almost all companies that apply self-adaptation have mechanisms in place for monitoring, but not necessarily for analysis and change, regardless of company size, but the differences are small

elements.2211.03116_c8729dd35150d4d133e0940c3a8d7: We discuss validity threats of our study using the guidelines described in
elements.2211.03116_0cf657b779c169b3e7c6b3f98a026: We look at construct validity that refers to the extent to which we obtained the right measure and whether we defined the right scope for the study goal, external validity that refers to the extent to which the findings can be generalized, and reliability that refers to the extent to which we can ensure that our results are the same if our study is done again.
elements.2211.03116_7e7f1a46419992d696c6a36d70560: The survey starts from the assumption that practitioners are sufficiently familiar with the basic concepts of self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_6a3874e91f37d540472ce5c740811: We used the term self-adaptation to formulate questions about systems (or parts) that are equipped with a feedback loop
elements.2211.03116_3a71cd479e19cced2bf1367737868: Hence, most questions required basic knowledge of the concept of self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_162052f1932ec0224c38b1dcdf077: Analysis of the results makes it clear that practitioners have a basic understanding these concepts
elements.2211.03116_22ee44a75b4269579c6add2403a5d: Yet, we used several measures to reduce possible misinterpretations
elements.2211.03116_73ef82d82fd5b1c2c3720596ffe4f: We introduced the notion of self-adaptation at the start of the survey using a standard model with a feedback loop that we illustrated with typical examples
elements.2211.03116_4aa7a5588f5801d7b13f753abeaaa: We elicited feedback for several participants on this description and the questions during a pilot
elements.2211.03116_678a206688b057e8038b4e185b176: This feedback enabled us to enhance the description and clarify some of the questions
elements.2211.03116_461bbedf87110a6e79816847345db: In addition, we selected participants with sufficient experience from a variety of domains
elements.2211.03116_8d514d6cb9e532eccceb75076dce1: The confidence in the answers (Q5.1) confirms that the participants believed that their answers were trustworthy.
elements.2211.03116_95fb38efe10bc02435fd03f105107: A potential threat to validity may be the generalisation of the study results
elements.2211.03116_d6418d4308bf4efa732a469ff902d: Core to this threat is the selection of the sample of the target population
elements.2211.03116_297438c882c03c98810f7ff7adfc6: If this population may not have been representative, the study results may be imprecise and hence not generalisable
elements.2211.03116_0dd016e48830a45fdb3d153fd640b: Since we used a non-probabilistic sampling method, there is a potential risk that the sample used to conduct the survey is biased and not representative of the target population
elements.2211.03116_eada4916be79fd73158cd11ed2f50: To mitigate the validity threat we mainly reached out to practitioners from our networks with industry
elements.2211.03116_f6d1e03a44c89a25ba0eae5f6a67f: To ensure that participants have the required experience, we included questions asking about personal experience with engineering self-adaptive systems in practice
elements.2211.03116_f4d72e5b796aa509b4707176d944d: The results of the demographics of our sample show that the participants were active practitioners with sufficient expertise in various roles across companies of different sizes
elements.2211.03116_9a03b9b24925a45560915d8f8f58a: In addition, we worked in total with eight teams from different areas that contacted practitioners from all over the world
elements.2211.03116_d70be10b7f197b0abcebc47c73b96: This ensured a well-balanced population on a global scale
elements.2211.03116_13a317fae9d7feabf214f71cceb95: Because several of the researchers involved in this study are active in the field of engineering self-adaptive systems, the practitioners invited from our networks may have been biased and inclined to apply self-adaptation more often
elements.2211.03116_90d938a08cf603b720687826537be: To anticipate this threat, we did not particularly focus on practitioners that we have worked within projects, but rather invited practitioners in various software engineering roles that are active across a wide range of domains.
elements.2211.03116_f149642b8fa0eadd277d0b3e8e6a8: Data analysis, in particular qualitative analysis (coding of answers with free text), are creative tasks that are to some extent subjective
elements.2211.03116_19b26238ba08dae510a199cd2227d: Performing these tasks may be influenced by the experience (and even opinions) of the coders
elements.2211.03116_f68ca1fb43a96967929d4f284de03: To mitigate a potential interpretation bias, we followed a thorough coding scheme
elements.2211.03116_77712e00cbb382f95cd733f684deb: The coding tasks were distributed among teams of two authors (one team of three)
elements.2211.03116_f1e75cfd151c254bf4d656a3f02f4: The authors of each team performed coding of the data independently and discussed where needed until an agreement was reached
elements.2211.03116_2e299e347e745ac713e1df601a370: All coding tasks were then distributed again among two authors
elements.2211.03116_8795f7555faba267adcda73ca737a: These authors repeated the coding independently from the initial coding
elements.2211.03116_3fe670948e1e0122681f540b05222: The results were then compared with the initial coding by these two authors
elements.2211.03116_28d80570cd392d418317ffc4905dc: Any discrepancies were discussed among the two authors until consensus was reached
elements.2211.03116_cdc13eb864bd706b2d10b43debba3: The coding was finally crosschecked with the authors that did the original coding to reach consensus
elements.2211.03116_c86d6ba4373dde0e006949ff08555: Finally, all material of the survey, including the raw data and the coding are publicly available.

elements.2211.03116_7ae287f5b1c1113fc78cf45e5d47b: ALLOCATES Ilias Gerostathopoulos, Patricia Lago: E1, E2, D1, D2 Nadeem Abbas, Jesper Andersson: E3, E4, D3, D4 Stefan Biffl, Angelika Musil, Juergen Musil: E5, E6, Tomas Bures, Premek Brada: E3, E4, D5, D6 Matthias Galster, Patros Panos: E1, E2, D5, D6 Amleto Di Salle, Patrizio Pelliccione: D1, D2, R1, R2 Grace Lewis, Marin Litoiu: E5, E6, D3, D4
elements.2211.03116_b18900a4aa70612ac2a597d9599f2: In this paper, we studied the application of self-adaptation in industry
elements.2211.03116_86f470d7543443d6d3fe74966ae05: To that end, we conducted a questionnaire-based survey with practitioners from all over the world
elements.2211.03116_7480abb0fca5c5368e1ac37cf4bf3: We received valid responses from 184 participants, 100 of them with experience in engineering self-adaptive systems
elements.2211.03116_a0085d3592957f2dfdc12c5bcbc64: By analysing the data, we contributed an empirically grounded overview of state-of-the-practice in the application of self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_ee38a75319bd82c59ac9ae4f21ce2: A selection of key observations includes: i) self-adaptation is extensively applied in industry across a wide variety of domains, ii) the dominating types of adaptations applied in industry are auto-scaling, auto-tuning, and monitoring/analysis, iii) practitioners rely extensively on tools and infrastructure to realise the different functions of self-adaptation, iv) human supervision is important to ensure trust in industrial self-adaptive systems, v) about half of the participants encounter risks with applying self-adaptation, vi) on the other hand, about half of the practitioners would appreciate support from researchers to deal with problems they face
elements.2211.03116_8d084adb44026bd7e722e8c0a65cf: The results offer insights for researchers that enable them to compare the focus their of their current research with industrial needs
elements.2211.03116_ff15b2a09f49224d22d643382e27f: A selection of related key insights includes: i) different from academics that study adaptation for mitigating uncertainty of classic maintenance tasks (self-*), practitioners also emphasise the importance of improving user satisfaction, reducing costs, and mitigating risks, ii) practitioners (in particular those of small and medium sized companies) rely on tools and infrastructure to realise self-adaptation, iii) ensuring trust in industrial self-adaptive systems is mainly achieved through extensive testing, runtime monitoring and alerting, and human supervision, iv) risks with self-adaptation in practice relate mainly to incorrect functionality, difficulty to manage environment uncertainty, degraded performance and increased cost
elements.2211.03116_60f78069d392a8dc88b1a3949cc6b: The results also offer insights for practitioners to assess the level of their current practice in applying self-adaptation
elements.2211.03116_c08498d7e4ddd3d5b7be4cdc1afbb: A selection of related key insights includes: i) practitioners broadly confirm that the use of self-adaptation improves robustness and performance while reducing costs and required resources, and improves user experience while reducing the burden of engineers, ii) a wide range of mechanisms are used to enact self-adaptation in industrial systems, iii) tools and infrastructure, such as auto-scaling and container-orchestration platforms are available and commonly used to support the realisation of self-adaptation in practice, iv) important challenges when engineering self-adaptation in practice are reliable/optimal design, design complexity, and tuning/debugging, v) there is a relevant match between industrial practice in realising self-adaptation and the body of work performed by the research community of self-adaption
elements.2211.03116_8c1272c3777173b7a7c41761ba9c8: The survey results provide prospects for applying self-adaptation in practice and opportunities for industry-research collaborations in this area
elements.2211.03116_4e5ff0a9f20e54d71169905f3980b: The prospects include: i) realising full autonomous operation, ii) exploiting machine learning, iii) improving quality and security, and iv) applying self-adaptation for maintenance
elements.2211.03116_ae2a09d1203451d24a2e08fda731e: Key opportunities for industry-research collaborations are in: i) consolidating best practices (architecture, patterns, and reuse), ii) modelling paths for the adoption of self-adaptation in industry, iii) supporting advanced features to realise self-adaptation such as dealing with the evolution of self-adaptive systems, iv) rigorous methods for ensuring trustworthiness of self-adaptive systems, v) governance of data, and vi) moving the human in the loop (performing adaptation functions) to the human on the loop (overseeing the system to ensure trust)
elements.2211.03116_990e74ff7ed6f296aa90decc7e7aa: We hope that the results of this survey will propel industry-relevant research in the field of self-adaptive systems and enhance the application of self-adaptation in practice, paving the way for self-adaptation to reach full maturity as a discipline.
elements.2211.03116_c85bf8648c0fefd1ab98eb68051f5: We would like to thank the participants of our study and the reviewers of the survey protocol.
